---
title: People
layout: no-menu
---
{% assign sorted_people = site.data.people|key_sort:'name' %}

<h1> {{ page.title }} </h1>

<div class="people-table">
<table>
<tr>
<th>Registered</th><th>Name</th><th>Home</th><th>Area</th><th>Role</th></tr>
{%- for person in sorted_people -%}
    {%- if person[1].size > 0 -%}
      <tr id="smallbottommargin">
          <td>{{ person[1].arrival }}</td>
          <td><a href="{{ person[0] }}">{{ person[1].name }}</a></td>
          <td>{{ person[1].home }}</td>
          <td>{{ person[1].area }}</td>
          <td>{{ person[1].role }}</td>
      </tr>
    {%- endif %}
{%- endfor -%}
</table>
</div>
